title: Quality of life change for Draft pick as a solo player.
body:
Please disable the ability to group as 4.

its an awful experience to deal with as a solo player.

1, 2, 3 or 5 only.

Thanks

replies.body:
I get what your meaning, but really it doesn't end up working as well, because then your forcing 4 man's to either find another random player off a friends list (and acting the same way) or forcing them to not play the game because they are at the wrong number.

Ranked is a different beast where saying no 4 mans makes sense, in normal's it's not really a fair thing to say.
